tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lighting_patterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    light_intensity FLOAT,
    energy_consumption FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE lighting_patterns (lighting_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_id INT, pattern_name VARCHAR(50), pattern_duration INT, start_time TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, trend_name VARCHAR(50), trend_description TEXT, trend_date DATE, trend_result FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE lighting_patterns (   id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   location TEXT,   pattern TEXT,   intensity FLOAT,   timestamp TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (   trend_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   pattern_id UUID,   start_date DATE,   end_date DATE,   trend TEXT );
CREATE TABLE energy_efficiency (   efficiency_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   trend_id UUID,   efficiency_rating FLOAT );

CREATE TABLE LightingPatterns ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE, 
    time TIME, 
    location VARCHAR(255), 
    brightness FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE TrendAnalysis ( 
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    pattern_id INT, 
    trend_name VARCHAR(255), 
    trend_description TEXT, 
    analysis_status VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE HistoricalData ( 
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    pattern_id INT, 
    trend_id INT, 
    efficiency_id INT, 
    recorded_date timestamp 
);
